short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhancements for search result pages and a friendly reminder to log in before signing up to ride a permanent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sortable columns, search results links to more search results, restructuring of tables, etc.

New feature: shift+clicking on  a column header now copies the content of the column onto clipboard.
